document_data.name: Shard
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shard''' were a mercenary company based in [[Orsraun Mountains]].
document_data.History: In [[1356 DR]], some adventurers saw the bodies of three [[red dragon]]s and of a large number of [[ogre]] members of the Shard. The company was considered dead after that but some ogres may have escaped with the treasure of the group.
